page.title: 07CUSTOMS - Annual Carnival.
page.content: The{Carnival}was{first introduced in{1965.}We have a{fairground}and, on {Carnival Day,}there are various {competitions(dog shows,fun runs etc.),a{parade}through the village using{floats,}and{fancy-dress. The entertainers on the day include clowns, parachutists, trampolinists, and an aerobatic display. During the week of the carnival there are{disco's and entertainment}in the marquees erected in the park. There is also a{'Miss Skelton' competition and a{football tournament for the local schools. This is one of the{main events of {the village year.}Admission is only {30p.}for adults, children are free.
